tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE student_performance (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    student_id UUID,
    engagement_score INT,
    performance_score INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (student_id) REFERENCES teachers(id)
);

CREATE TABLE students (
    student_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    age INT,
    grade VARCHAR(10),
    engagement_score FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE courses (
    course_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    teacher_id INT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE grades (
    grade_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    student_id INT,
    course_id INT,
    grade VARCHAR(2),
    feedback TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE grades (
    grade_id BIGINT PRIMARY KEY,
    student_id BIGINT REFERENCES students(student_id),
    assignment_id BIGINT REFERENCES assignments(assignment_id),
    grade FLOAT,
    comments TEXT
);
